markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Tireless Worker](/Spells.aspx?ID=2418)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 271, [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 65

**Domain**
[Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** [sustained](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that’s affecting the target: [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61), [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=70), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71), or [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73). The duration of the condition doesn’t elapse while it is suppressed, so if you don’t remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell’s duration expires.
name: Tireless Worker

text: Tireless Worker Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 271, Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 65 Domain Toil Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that’s affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued. The duration of the condition doesn’t elapse while it is suppressed, so if you don’t remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell’s duration expires.
